name: UStackBox
doc:
A stack box widget is a layout panel allowing child widgets to be automatically laid out
vertically or horizontally.

* Many Children
* Flows Vertical or Horizontal

Orientation: The orientation of the stack box.

methods.name: AddChildToStackBox
methods.doc: Adds a new child widget to the container.

methods.name: ReplaceStackBoxChildAt
methods.doc: Replace the widget at the given index it with a different widget.
